title: YASUO. IS. IN. EVERY. SINGLE. MATCH.
body:
Not one, not ONE match in the past week that hasn't had Yasuo on at least one team.

He's op and in every single game. He's ruining normals. People just build him like a bruiser and do basically the same damage as he does glass cannon but he loses the one weakness he had which was being squishy.

replies.body: yasuo is a big reason to never play normal blind, mostly for laning against that piece of bullshit
so im forced to playing ranked if i wanna play summoner's rift? seems fair.

Ranked has Lee Sin in every game instead.
(Yasuo is only in the games where he slips through the ban phase.)
ban phase?

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T09:47:13.258+0000)
>
> ban phase?

they removed normal draft on eune
Wait only on eune? Wow.... well I have an euw account too.
They removed normal draft on all servers except NA, EUW & the Brazil server.

Wonder how they will train on a draft mode...
...Oh wait.
There's the Flex Queue, where almost everyone doesn't take the game seriously

Just pick {{champion:84}} , great! Now you just made Yasuo irrelivant for the whole game.

He Q's you with tornado? Just drop shroud and he can't ult. 

Throws that bullshit Windwall out? Just use your ult first then Q for tons of damage.

He dashes through mid lane like the little ballerina he is? Just dump your combo on him everytime he tries to touch you. 

This is one of the reasons I accept champs like Akali and point and click champs, sometimes they are needed to keep bullshit where it belongs. In the trash can.
I wish we could just have 625 AA range Annie again so he can be insta-countered
fair enough but why have either of them.  Frankly they are both cancer for the game.
akali at least needs her abilities to fight if she blows her combo and doesn't kill shes in trouble yasuo just keeps going.
You misspelled Lee Sin

{{item:3031}} + {{item:3087}}+100% Crit at 250% dmg.  Ergo that 70 AD on IE is now 175 AD on YAS for every auto and Q.  {{item:3072}} is now 150 AD and which essentially doubles the Life steal.  Now you pick any 4 you want...{{item:3143}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3111}}{{item:3047}}.  Now stand and trade autos and laugh.  Smack QE back and forth and push R when the screen lights up.  GG.  Don't forget to T bag people because you are a douchebag Yasou main.


He is my #1 Ban.  So I don't see him much anymore thank goodness.
he doesn't have 250% dmg

He doesn't get 250% AD but with 100% crit you crit on every auto, and IE buffs crit to 250% of your AD there fore you do 250% your AD on every auto attack and Q buffs auto so it does 250% damage.

Edit: to the %%%% that want's to nit pick his passive.  Reduce the 250 on auto to 240 and Q to 225.  The point still stands.  In trades he will win trading autos without Q with anyone at even gold/build due to passive 2x crit.  Because for any other champ to get 100% crit they will have to build non AD, but AS items.  Effectively making them weak then him all game.
Yasuo's passive makes it so that crits only deal 90% bonus damage.
and 75% on his Q if i remember correctly.

Wow, so a he loses 60 damage from a 600 crit, and 200 damage from his Q crit.

So he loses a support auto damage from his AA, and does a normal crit damage with his Q.

Woah, what a downside, he gets shield passive since it's that bad of a downside too.

he effectively ends up dealing 475 damage with Q with 100% crit and 200 AD, and 450 damage with an AA

unlike ADC (who stacks more AD) that ends up dealing 800 damage with a single AA in late game while having 80% crit chance.

> [{quoted}](name=ACENOX,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=000700000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-12-10T01:01:51.430+0000)
>
> he effectively ends up dealing 475 damage with Q with 100% crit and 200 AD, and 450 damage with an AA
> 
> unlike ADC (who stacks more AD) that ends up dealing 800 damage with a single AA in late game while having 80% crit chance.

They also die in one second and less mobile.

> [{quoted}](name=Thurst28,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-12-09T11:33:37.387+0000)
>
> {{item:3031}} + {{item:3087}}+100% Crit at 250% dmg.  Ergo that 70 AD on IE is now 175 AD on YAS for every auto and Q.  {{item:3072}} is now 150 AD and which essentially doubles the Life steal.  Now you pick any 4 you want...{{item:3143}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3111}}{{item:3047}}.
> 
> 

"{{item:3031}} + {{item:3087}} , then {{item:3072}} , now pick any 4 you want" So you're buying 7 items?

One of the tank items I see Yasuos always building is {{item:3022}} . Perma slow which his long reaching Q applies so there's no escape. It also gives him a bit more AD and with his wind wall and constant passive shield.... that 700hp helps a lot.

don't like yasuo.... play Olaf, he just doesn't care.  Play Irelia, once level 4 all in him.  Play Fiora. Jax.  Play Darius, also doesn't care.  Play Diana, she doesn't care much after level 3.  Ekko.  Play Trundle.  Play Poppy. Renekton doesn't care. Play Camille and rofl stomp him.  Play Kayle,  windwall lol, that's cute eat my e, fervor of battle and rageblade back reasonablly. Play Syndra.  Look, tons do very well against Yasuo, not Gnar though.

Trundle cant kill him, neither can Poppy. Jax gets destroyed by Yasuo becasue for some reason he doesnt dodge his Q so get fucked. Fiora is a skill matchup and Kayle is too, but Kayle needs a couple of items to beat him. Syndra lol, get your ulti blocked because of reasons. I agree on others doe.

Don't talk about champions you don't know. Jax destroys Yasuo. His burst is what beats Yasuo down. E is used more for the stun to keep him locked down for enough time to kill him.

EDIT: Jax main. I don't lose to Yasuo's.
I agree mostly.  But locking down Yas to land those 3-4 autos it takes to kill him is sometimes easier said then done.
have u not seen jax with ghost keke
I have.  I play a lot of Jax and always run ghost.  But with his E dash on like a .4sec CD it's not always that easy.
Gnar v Yasuo more of a skill match up.

> [{quoted}](name=NightmareAmazoX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2016-12-09T15:55:24.750+0000)
>
> Gnar v Yasuo more of a skill match up.

Yasuo wins that matchup hard early but provided Gnar doesn't feed out his ass isn't too far behind in farm starts to win around level 9-11 or so

> [{quoted}](name=Gnarles Barkleyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T19:20:22.222+0000)
>
> Yasuo wins that matchup hard early but provided Gnar doesn't feed out his ass isn't too far behind in farm starts to win around level 9-11 or so

Gnar can't duel Yasuo at any point of the game if Yasuo isn't behind.

It's kinda making norm games boring as f when mid or top keeps feeding Yas and then you got this tanky thing with high crit and ad running around killing everything inside and out of tower... Just waiting for minions to line up his little bridge to kill your champ. Riot should make Yas' ult prone to hard cc like Katarina, or lower his wind shield blocking that activates like every practically 8 seconds at max rank. It's alright that he's so mobile and has a wind wall that practically can block mostly all linear or projectile ults and non-ults in game, and is more op than Braums' sheilding. Most of all, does he have to have extra crits and a sheild???
Ya, seeing yasuo in every single game is cancerous especially when you're playing an immobile mage against tank yasuo ;_;

If you are playing against tanksuo, he is doing crap damage.

Not only that, but he's losing most matchups at mid lane.
so is cait, like every single one.
Ya if Yasuo isn't building full damage you shouldn't be losing that bad to him. Pretty sure the problems on your end..

> [{quoted}](name=Zedex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-12-09T14:10:07.498+0000)
>
> Ya if Yasuo isn't building full damage you shouldn't be losing that bad to him. Pretty sure the problems on your end..

100% crit isn't enough with IE and Statikk shiv?
No armor pen without his ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengeden,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T16:49:16.579+0000)
>
> No armor pen without his ult.

Masteries give him armor pen. Combined with his stupid easy to access ult, its np.

7%.

Against non-tanks it's as good as non-existing.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=00100000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T23:45:30.821+0000)
>
> 7%.
> 
> Against non-tanks it's as good as non-existing.

Against non-tanks, he has 100% crit which also doubles Statikk shivs damage plus the 250% damage from IE. What are you trying to fight in this argument? Squishies or Tanks? You keep flip flopping.

I'm only responding to your comment sounding as if Masteries gave him Last Whisper-tier of armor pen.

Plus, I'm not flip flopping, because that was my first comment directed at you.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ztk1U4cm,comment-id=0010000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-10T12:53:23.998+0000)
>
> I'm only responding to your comment sounding as if Masteries gave him Last Whisper-tier of armor pen.
> 
> Plus, I'm not flip flopping, because that was my first comment directed at you.

You don't seem to grasp what I meant about flip flopping arguments. 7% is more than enough to do damage until he inevitably pops you in the air and ults you. That's how he wins fights. He doesnt need armor pen to kill squishies. If you can't get your ult off, you're probably just bad seeing as how it is spoon fed to Yasuo. His kit has more than enough armor pen for IE and Statikk to be all he needs. Not to mention, Statikk is hybrid damage.

That's like saying Sorc shoes give enough M.pen for a mage to kill a tank.
Except Sorcs give more magic pen that the 7% mastery ever will.

Not to mention I'm possibly one of two people who are still building Statikk on Yasuo, because everybody else is getting Phantom Dancer.

Plus, his passive doesn't double Statikk's proc damage, because the crit damage penalty also applies to Statikk.
MORE YASUO THREADS

False, they don't do the same damage as they do when he's glass cannon build.

However damage is so over reaching now, that it doesn't matter. If i burst you for 110% of your max health, you're dead. If i burst you for 250% of your max health you're still dead, the extra 140% of your max health in damage didn't mean shit. Riot said they wanted to address the time to kill of assassins, but i hope they've realized that the burst champion's time to kill can't be reduced, until you actually fix the stupidly small time to kill of the rest of your game.

he was never squishy to begin with

he can easy get 3/4 shields in a fight giving him essentially double hp

In between that he draintanks with lifesteal since he only needs to get 2 items for max crit

and if shit gets real wind wall . . .

>he can easy get 3/4 shields in a fight giving him essentially double hp

What the actual fuck.

What kind of a fight lasts at least 1 minute?

dude u realize he can start with a shield get a shield from ult and regenrate his flow once in a fight easily enough thats 3 shields

or 4 in an extended figth
